properties.areaDesc: Coastal waters from Provincetown MA to Chatham MA to Nantucket MA out 20 nm; Coastal waters east of Ipswich Bay and the Stellwagen Bank National Marine Sanctuary
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 10 at 10:10PM EST until January 11 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Boston/Norton MA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, southwest winds 10 to 15
kt with gusts up to 25 kt and seas 3 to 5 feet. For the Gale
Watch, southwest winds 20 to 30 kt with gusts up to 40 kt and
seas 7 to 10 feet possible.

* WHERE...Coastal waters east of Ipswich Bay and the Stellwagen
Bank National Marine Sanctuary and Coastal waters from
Provincetown MA to Chatham MA to Nantucket MA out 20 nm.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, until 1 AM EST Saturday.
For the Gale Watch, from late Saturday night through Sunday
afternoon.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and seas.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST SATURDAY... ...GALE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT THROUGH SUNDAY AFTERNOON
